short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Boondoggle companion to connect all your socials to any CRM!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies each time you use Boondoggle.

Use Boondoggle seamlessly by installing our Chrome browser extension. This extension will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies each time you use Boondoggle.

Here is what you can achieve by using Boondoggle:

- Manage your lead generation campaigns in one place.
- Collect additional lead information and create a link between platforms.
- Collect lead data from the web and connect with your leads on engagement platforms.
